channel.title: Making a safe zone
channel.description:
[b]NOTE ~ This probably has been done so many times before, but i could not find a tut for this so i decided to make one. [/b]
This is a tutorial on how to create a safe zone in your server. I used it when making a new home and skilling area.
[b]-STEP 1[/b]:
Open up client.java and search for this... [code](((absX[/code] ~NOTE~ It might be easier searching for something like "safezone" or "nonwild"
ABSX means The X cord. ABSY means the Y cord.
[b]-STEP 2:[/b]
Now you will hopefully see the safe zones for you're server. now add this in [code]absX >= (BLX) && absX <= (TRX) && absY >= (BLY) && absY <=(TRY) ) ||[/code]
You see the (BLX), (TRX), (BLY), and (TRY)?
Right basically when making the area a safe zone you have to imagine that its a square.
REPLACE (BLX) with the bottom left hand X cord. REPLACE (TRX) with the top right X Cord. REPLACE (BLY) with the bottom left hand Y cord. REPLACE (TRY) with the top right Y cord.
Once you have all the cords for each corner of the square, the centre of it will be the safe zone
[b]~EXAMPLE~[/b] This is one set of cords i made for an example [code]absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||[/code]
Thanks for reading and i hope that it helped you like it would have helped me. :)
Please feedback if there is anything wrong thanks
Tom

item.title: Making a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @soi_spoon soi spoon
item.description:
@soi_spoon wrote:

NOTE ~ This probably has been done so many times before, but i could not find a tut for this so i decided to make one.

This is a tutorial on how to create a safe zone in your server. I used it when making a new home and skilling area.

-STEP 1:

Open up client.java and search for this…

(((absX

~NOTE~ It might be easier searching for something like “safezone” or “nonwild”

ABSX means The X cord.
ABSY means the Y cord.

-STEP 2:

Now you will hopefully see the safe zones for you’re server. now add this in

absX >= (BLX) && absX <= (TRX) && absY >= (BLY) && absY <=(TRY) ) ||

You see the (BLX), (TRX), (BLY), and (TRY)?

Right basically when making the area a safe zone you have to imagine that its a square.

REPLACE (BLX) with the bottom left hand X cord.
REPLACE (TRX) with the top right X Cord.
REPLACE (BLY) with the bottom left hand Y cord.
REPLACE (TRY) with the top right Y cord.

Once you have all the cords for each corner of the square, the centre of it will be the safe zone

~EXAMPLE~
This is one set of cords i made for an example

absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||

Thanks for reading and i hope that it helped you like it would have helped me.

Please feedback if there is anything wrong thanks

Tom
